tool_description: Validates annotation quality by checking coordinate accuracy, class consistency, overlap detection, and annotation completeness according to project standards.

annotation_ids.description: List of annotation IDs to validate

overlap_threshold.description: IoU threshold for detecting overlapping annotations (0.0 to 1.0)

min_bbox_area.description: Minimum required bounding box area in pixels

strict_mode.description: Enable strict validation with additional quality checks

error_messages: Invalid project_id: Project identifier must be non-empty and exist. Verify project_id is correct.
Empty annotation_ids: At least one annotation ID is required for validation. Provide annotation IDs in the array.
Annotation not found: One or more annotation_ids do not exist in the project. Check all annotation IDs are valid.
Invalid validation_rules: Rules must be from [coordinates, class_consistency, overlap_detection, minimum_size, completeness]. Check rule names.
Invalid overlap_threshold: Threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive. Adjust overlap_threshold value.
Invalid min_bbox_area: Minimum area must be a positive number. Set min_bbox_area to a value > 0.
usage: Provide project_id and annotation_ids array for validation. Customize validation_rules, overlap_threshold, min_bbox_area, and strict_mode as needed. Returns detailed validation results for each annotation.

passed_count.description: Number of annotations that passed validation

failed_count.description: Number of annotations that failed validation

annotation_scores.description: Quality scores for each validated annotation (0.0 to 1.0)
